plugin.label: decimator
plugin.name: Decimator
plugin.p: Decimates (reduces the effective sample rate), and reduces the bit depth of the input signal, allows non integer values for smooth transitions between clean and lofi signals.

port.label: bits
port.name: Bit depth
port.p: The bit depth that the signal will be reduced to.

port.label: fs
port.name: Sample rate (Hz)
port.p: The sample rate that the signal will be resampled at.
